value:
$WmMPID_春祭マリア,ch01_08_Maria_F_SpringFes22,Face|Michalis, Minerva! This way—hurry!$k$p$WmMPID_春祭ミネルバ,ch01_21_Minerba_F_SpringFes21,Face|Slow down, Maria. It's dangerous
to dart around like that.$k$p$WmMPID_春祭マリア,ch01_08_Maria_F_SpringFes22,Face|It's just...I've been looking forward
to this for so, so long!$k$pAnd now the three of us are finally
able to enjoy the festival together!$k$pI'm so glad you came, Michalis!$k$p$WmMPID_春祭ミシェイル,ch01_22_Misheil_M_SpringFes23,Face|Yes, well...$k$pYou are free to enjoy yourself,
but do so without such an open
display of...glee. It is unseemly.$k$p$WmMPID_春祭ミネルバ,ch01_21_Minerba_F_SpringFes21,Face|It IS a festival, Brother. Surely Maria
can be allowed to express some
modicum of joy.$k$p$WmMPID_春祭ミシェイル,ch01_22_Misheil_M_SpringFes23,Face|We are the royal family of Macedon.
No matter the situation, we must
maintain our dignity.$k$pYou are too soft on her, Minerva.$k$p$WmMPID_春祭ミネルバ,ch01_21_Minerba_F_SpringFes21,Face|No, you are held hostage by your
title and station. Let her be.$k$p$WmMPID_春祭マリア,ch01_08_Maria_F_SpringFes22,Face|Umm... Michalis? ...Minerva?$k$p$WmMPID_春祭ミネルバ,ch01_21_Minerba_F_SpringFes21,Face|An invitation to attend the festival of
another world is not an opportunity
most will ever be given.$k$pSetting aside the burden of royal
responsibility to enjoy our good
fortune should be encouraged.$k$p$WmMPID_春祭ミシェイル,ch01_22_Misheil_M_SpringFes23,Face|I said she is free to enjoy it. But that
enjoyment need not be put on such
display. That is all.$k$pMacedon's reputation is affected
by our every action.$k$p$WmMPID_春祭ミネルバ,ch01_21_Minerba_F_SpringFes21,Face|Dignity, reputation... Even here and
now, you are unable to let these—$k$p...Do as you wish. Come, Maria.$k$p$WmMPID_春祭マリア,ch01_08_Maria_F_SpringFes22,Face|Um...Michalis?$k$p$WmMPID_春祭ミシェイル,ch01_22_Misheil_M_SpringFes23,Face|...$k$p$Sbs150|

$WmMPID_春祭ベルナデッタ,ch17_10_Bernadeta_F_SpringFes23,Face|Mm... So nice and warm... I could
sleep forever surrounded by all the
snugly bunnies...$k$p$WmMPID_春祭アッシュ,ch17_15_Ashe_M_SpringFes23,Face|Bernadetta, wake up! You should
at least join us for the egg-hunting
tournament!$k$pI hate to do this, but...a little
help, Triandra?$k$p$WmMPID_春祭スカビオサ,ch00_24_Scabiosa_F_SpringFes23,Face|...I suppose.$k$p

$SbpBGM_EVENT_PLAIN_03,0|$WmMPID_春祭ベルナデッタ,ch17_10_Bernadeta_F_SpringFes23,Face|WAAAHHH! Wh-why do all the
bunnies have...human faces?!
They're all looking at me!$k$pOh... It was just a dream?$k$p$WmMPID_春祭アッシュ,ch17_15_Ashe_M_SpringFes23,Face|Good morning, Bernadetta! Shall we
head to the tournament now?$k$p$WmMPID_春祭ベルナデッタ,ch17_10_Bernadeta_F_SpringFes23,Face|Huh? Oh nooo! The nightmare
is just beginning...$k$p$Sbs150|
